revised_title: Investigating Reciprocal Innervation in Vaso-motor Reflexes and the Action of Strychnine and Chloroform
tldr: The author investigates the effects of reciprocal innervation in vaso-motor reflexes and the actions of strychnine and chloroform on these reflexes. The study provides experimental evidence for the presence of both excitatory and inhibitory effects on vaso-constrictor and vaso-dilator nerves, contributing to a better understanding of vascular regulation.
